_sText:
NOTE: In the terrorsit carrier truck the driving stick is all the way to the right seat push E on that 
NOTE: In the tank the safest part to drive is in the middle of the 2 seats
Remember being the first car map its not perfect so don't complain about some of the cars not turning properly the cars aren't perfect.
Also follow these tips for a totally safe ride:
1: Stay in saftey zone while car is in motion
2: For maximum speed step away from button (while still staying in the safety zone)
3: Push the button and walk like u normally would
4: E or jumping gets you out of the car
5: Do not jump while car is in motion
6: If car doesn't fully turn then strafe to were you wanna go
7: If after the jump you cannot move jump a couple of times you might still be operating car
Well thats it have a fun time playing this map there will be more car maps from llama, if they aren't posted on here you can always dl them straight from my server at 70.181.129.199:27015. Ip may vary due to time and my server isnt 24/7 so its not always up.
